00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements division
00004 #
00005 package Parser::BOP::divide;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that operand types are OK.
00011 #  Check for division by zero.
00012 #
00013 sub _check {
00014   my $self = shift;
00015   return if $self->checkStrings();
00016   return if $self->checkLists();
00017   $self->Error("Division by zero") if $self->{rop}{isZero};
00018   return if $self->checkNumbers();
00019   my ($ltype,$rtype) = $self->promotePoints();
00020   if ($ltype->{name} =~ m/Vector|Matrix/ && $rtype->{name} eq 'Number') {$self->{type} = {%{$ltype}}}
00021   elsif ($self->context->flag("allowBadOperands")) {$self->{type} = $Value::Type{number}}
00022   else {$self->Error("Division is allowed only for Numbers or a Vector, Point, or Matrix and a Number")}
00023 }
00024 
00025 #
00026 #  Do the division.
00027 #
00028 sub _eval {$_[1] / $_[2]}
00029 
00030 #
00031 #  Remove division by 1.
00032 #  Error for division by zero.
00033 #  Reduce zero divided by anything (non-zero) to zero.
00034 #  Factor out negatives.
00035 #
00036 sub _reduce {
00037   my $self = shift;
00038   my $reduce = $self->{equation}{context}{reduction};
00039   return $self->{lop} if $self->{rop}{isOne} && $reduce->{'x/1'};
00040   $self->Error("Division by zero"), return $self if $self->{rop}{isZero};
00041   return $self->{lop} if $self->{lop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'0/x'};
00042   return $self->makeNeg($self->{lop}{op},$self->{rop})
00043     if $self->{lop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'(-x)/y'};
00044   return $self->makeNeg($self->{lop},$self->{rop}{op})
00045     if $self->{rop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'x/(-y)'};
00046   return $self;
00047 }
00048 
00049 $Parser::reduce->{'x/1'} = 1;
00050 $Parser::reduce->{'0/x'} = 1;
00051 $Parser::reduce->{'(-x)/y'} = 1;
00052 $Parser::reduce->{'x/(-y)'} = 1;
00053 
00054 #
00055 #  Use \frac for TeX version.
00056 #
00057 sub TeX {
00058   my $self = shift;
00059   my ($precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00060   my $TeX; my $bop = $self->{def};
00061   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) if $self->{def}{noFrac};
00062   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00063   my $addparens =
00064       defined($precedence) &&
00065       ($showparens eq 'all' || ($precedence > $bop->{precedence} && $showparens ne 'nofractions') ||
00066       ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00067         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || $showparens eq 'same')));
00068 
00069   $TeX = '\frac{'.($self->{lop}->TeX).'}{'.($self->{rop}->TeX).'}';
00070 
00071   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if ($addparens);
00072   return $TeX;
00073 }

00077 1;
